data.title: University of Michigan Special Collections Research Center
data.text:
Projects 2000s forms part Robert Altman Archive. It includes materials related to The Company, Dr. T and the Women, Gosford Park, A Prairie Home Companion, Resurrection Blues, Roads and Bridges, Tanner on Tanner, andTrixie . Records include scripts, legal files, publicity materials, photographs and correspondence.

Robert Bernard Altman (February 20, 1925 â€“ November 20, 2006): notable American film director and screenwriter known for making films that are highly naturalistic, incorporating ensemble casts and a stylized perspective. In addition to numerous awards for individual films, the Academy of Motion Picture Arts and Sciences recognized his body of work with an Academy Honorary Award in 2006.
